description: Offcourse is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he created the Superconnectors event format and founded the Innovator's Working Group of the Dutch Internet Society. With experience in various educational settings, he advocates for impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, Taiwan, offcourse focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work combines education, technology, and philosophy to create innovative solutions for knowledge dissemination and community building.
